thread.title_full: Prince William praises Diana at London event | News | albanyherald.com

author: Rob Picheta and Lauren Said-Moorhouse, CNN
title: Prince William praises Diana at London event | News | albanyherald.com
text: (CNN) — Prince William praised his mother the late Princess Diana at an event in London on Thursday, saying she taught him that everyone “has the potential to give something back.” The event, marking the 25th anniversary of The Diana Awards, was also slated to include virtual remarks by Prince Harry, William’s brother, making it one of the few occasions both princes have taken part in since Harry quit royal duties. kAmx? 9:D DA6649[ (:==:2> E@=5 E96 2F5:6?46 E92E 96 2?5 9:D H:76[ E96 !C:?46DD @7 (2=6D[ 92G6 D@F89E E@ 7@4FD @? s:2?2’D =6824J E9C@F89 E96:C H@C 6 5@:?8 DF49 :?DA:C2E:@?2= H@C 2== 4@C?6CD @7 E96 8=@36[” E96 !C:?46 @7 (2=6D D2:5[ 244@C5:?8 E@ 2 DE2E6>6?E 3J z6?D:?8E@? !2=246]k^Am kAm“$96 E2F89E >6 E92E 6G6CJ@?6 92D E96 A@E6?E:2= E@ 8:G6 D@>6E9:?8 324 D@ AC@F5 E@ D66 E9:D 36=:67 @7 >J >@E96C’D >2?:76DE65 :?
